main event: A round, yellow object the size of a pea was observed to be stationary for 12 minutes over Burbank, California on August 26, 1955.
interesting points: The object remained stationary for a period of 12 minutes.
The object was described as being round and yellow in color.
The object was estimated to be the size of a pea when held at arm's length.
The sighting was reported by a civilian aircraft worker.
The conclusion was that the sighting was likely generated by a balloon.
